data.event: In 1880, Thomas Carney immigrated to the United States from Ireland and settled in Texas, Maryland.

Several years later (about 1885), the Carney family moved to what is now Harford and Joppa roads, where Thomas Carney opened a general store which is believed to have served as the Eight Mile House on the turnpike.

event.title: now Harford and Joppa roads, where Thomas Carney opened

data.event: Several years later (about 1885), the Carney family moved to what is now Harford and Joppa roads, where Thomas Carney opened a general store which is believed to have served as the Eight Mile House on the turnpike.
The house was completed in about 1898 and stood in the vicinity of what is now Thornewood Court.

event.title: stood in the vicinity of what is now

data.event: The house was completed in about 1898 and stood in the vicinity of what is now Thornewood Court.

event.title: Thirty-five years later, the Carney house was moved

data.event: Thirty-five years later, the Carney house was moved to its present location at the corner of Joppa and Avondale roads and is now a real estate office.
